name: Knockback
summary: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.
description:
The weight of your swing drives your enemy back. You push the foe back 5 feet, with the effects of a successful Shove. You can follow the foe as normal for a successful Shove.Knockback Leads To...

Awesome BlowTraitsRage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
